title: Letter From the President to United States Steel Corporation Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary Scot Duncan
summary: President Donald J. Trump, holding the "Golden Share" in United States Steel Corporation (U.S. Steel), has exercised his authority to ensure the company's continued operation of its U.S. production facilities, which are deemed critical for American national security. He has designated the Under Secretary of Commerce for International Trade, William Kimmitt, to oversee U.S. Steel's compliance with the National Security Agreement. Additionally, President Trump has appointed David Shapiro, Chief Counsel of the Department of Commerce's Investment Accelerator, as the Class G Director for U.S. Steel, representing the U.S. Government's interests.
